title: Authors and Citation
text: Kenny C (2025). flexoki: Inky Color Schemes. R package version 0.0.1, https://christophertkenny.com/flexoki/, https://github.com/christopherkenny/flexoki.
code: @Manual{,   title = {flexoki: Inky Color Schemes},   author = {Christopher T. Kenny},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1, https://christophertkenny.com/flexoki/},   url = {https://github.com/christopherkenny/flexoki}, }

title: Inky Color Schemes
text: flexoki provides set color palettes Steph Ango’s https://stephango.com/flexoki. package provides: Dark light ggplot2 themes match aesthetic Flexoki’s code editor styles. Custom color fill scales discrete, continuous, binned data using Flexoki’s extended color schemes. Color palettes flexoki object, list palette vectors.

title: Inky Color Schemes
text: can install development version flexoki GitHub :

title: Inky Color Schemes
text: flexoki provides basic ggplot2 scales fill color (also aliased colour). similarly provides corresponding theme functions.
code: library(ggplot2) library(flexoki)  mpg |>   ggplot() +   geom_point(aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) +   scale_color_flexoki_d(palette = 'light') +   theme_flexoki_light()

title: flexoki: Inky Color Schemes — flexoki-package
text: Provides color palettes designed reminiscent text paper. color schemes taken https://stephango.com/flexoki. Includes discrete, continuous, binned scales necessarily color-blind friendly. Simple scale theme functions available use 'ggplot2'.

title: 'Flexoki' Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_flexoki_d
code: scale_color_flexoki_d(palette = "dark", which = NULL, ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_fill_flexoki_d(palette = "dark", which = NULL, ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_colour_flexoki_d(palette = "dark", which = NULL, ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_color_flexoki_c(palette = "red", ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_fill_flexoki_c(palette = "red", ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_colour_flexoki_c(palette = "red", ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_color_flexoki_b(palette = "red", ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_fill_flexoki_b(palette = "red", ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_colour_flexoki_b(palette = "red", ..., reverse = FALSE)

title: 'Flexoki' Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_flexoki_d
text: palette palette names(flexoki) use numeric indices colors use. NULL default. ... arguments passed ggplot2::discrete_scale() reverse vector reversed? Default FALSE.

title: 'Flexoki' Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_flexoki_d
code: ggplot2::mpg |>   ggplot2::ggplot() +   ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) +   scale_color_flexoki_d(palette = 'dark')   ggplot2::mpg |>   ggplot2::ggplot() +   ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(displ, hwy, fill = class),     pch = 23, color = 'transparent'   ) +   scale_fill_flexoki_d(palette = 'light')

title: Dark Theme — theme_flexoki_dark
text: base_size base font size, given pts. base_family base font family ... additional parameters

title: Dark Theme — theme_flexoki_dark
code: ggplot2::mpg |>   ggplot2::ggplot() +   ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) +   scale_color_flexoki(palette = 'dark') +   theme_flexoki_dark() #> Error in scale_color_flexoki(palette = "dark"): could not find function "scale_color_flexoki"

title: Light Theme — theme_flexoki_light
text: base_size base font size, given pts. base_family base font family ... additional parameters

title: Light Theme — theme_flexoki_light
code: ggplot2::mpg |>   ggplot2::ggplot() +   ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) +   scale_color_flexoki(palette = 'light') +   theme_flexoki_light() #> Error in scale_color_flexoki(palette = "light"): could not find function "scale_color_flexoki"
